name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Codeforces: Submission time in local timezone

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the time associated with your submissions in your local time zone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In codeforces, the user sees submission times for their code submissions in MST (Moscow Standard Time). This extension, converts and displays the time in your local time zone.
